      A method to remove Student from all Session and erase his/her Assessment data under the calling Course object.

      A method to store result of Student for an Assessment component under this Course.

      A method to print out the transcript of Student object being parsed in.

      A method to register Student into Session stored in this Course.

      A method to register Student object into Course, which object both being parsed in.

      A method to remove the grade/mark of Student object under the calling Assessment object.
      void Database.removeStudent​(Student student)
      A method to remove an existing Student from the database of this application.
      double Assessment.retrieveAssessmentResult​(Student student)
      A method to return the grade/mark of the calling Assessment object for the Student object being parsed in.

      A method to enter the result of Student for a particulat Course
      void Assessment.storeAssessmentResult​(Student student, double marks)
      A method to store store the marks of Student by inserting into a HashMap of Student (key) and marks(value).
      boolean Course.studentRegistered​(Student student)
      A method to validate if Student is registered under the calling Course or not.
      void StudentManager.updateCourseTaken​(Course course, Student student)
      A utility method to update/synchronise the Course taken by Student.
